hackathon-description-text: First Hackathon in Essex aimed excusively at students. The duration is 24h. In order to showcase student talent and display their innovative ideas, we are having it open themed.
hackathon-eligibility:
All participants must be students and over 18 on the day of the event.
Team size: up to 4 members.
hackathon-requirements: Being open themed, you can build anything as long as it abides by the rules mentioned above.
hackathon-rules:
Projects submissions may vary from a wide range of topics. All projects must be created at the event, but public open source code may be integrated into your projects. A fun and/or original project may get bonus points.
Lastly, the following code of conduct also applies: http://static.mlh.io/docs/mlh-code-of-conduct.pdf
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=University of Essex (Colchester), Colchester, Colchester, Essex CO4, UK
hackathon-location-address: University of Essex (Colchester), Colchester, Colchester, Essex CO4, UK
hackathon-description-header: Hackathon for the ones who love to challenge themselves!
hackathon-location-description: Tony Rich Teaching Centre, University of Essex
